name: mailerlite_load
description: This is the NESRM_ETL_PIPELINE mail platform loader. It uses the generic mailerlite_load as a submodule but then has CI/CD workflows and connects to the production environment

scripts.git_commit: git add . && git commit -m 'npm run ran this commit'
scripts.submod_change: git add . && git commit -m 'Submode Change' && git push origin main
scripts.submod: cd vendor/mailerlite_load && npm run git_commit --prefix ../.. && git push origin main && cd ../.. && npm run submod_change
